channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Is Trump’s trade strategy in limbo? Yes, but ‘Tariff Man’ has options.
item.description: Trump’s tariff playbook may be getting rewritten by the courts, but the era of low U.S. tariffs is over.

item.title: Consumer spending softened as tariffs kicked in. Anxious Americans saved more in April.
item.description: Households boosted spending in March, especially on cars, to avoid tariff-related price increases. They cut back last month as the tariffs started to ...

item.title: Airbnb’s stock is now a sell, as a subdued summer for leisure travel looms, analyst says
item.description: Analysts cut price targets across the U.S. hotel sector as expectations dip on wavering consumer confidence and a drop in inbound international travel...

item.title: ‘The situation is extreme’: I’m 65 and leaving my estate to only one grandchild. Can the others contest my will?
item.description: “I feel it is absolutely necessary to leave about 90% of what I have to just one grandchild.”

item.title: Markets are finely poised between a bullish breakout and bearish breakdown, says Bank of America strategist.
item.description: This market is poised for a breakout that could swing either in favor of the bulls or the bears, says Bank of America’s Michael Hartnett.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
